community.description: Image is accessible to the community

container_format.description: Image container format. The supported options are: ami, ari, aki, bare, docker, ova, ovf. The default format is: bare (choices: ami, ari, aki, bare, docker, ova, ovf)

disk_format.description: Image disk format. The supported options are: ami, ari, aki, vhd, vmdk, raw, qcow2, vhdx, vdi, iso, ploop. The default format is: raw (choices: ami, ari, aki, vhd, vmdk, raw, qcow2, vhdx, vdi, iso, ploop)

force.description: Force image creation if volume is in use (only meaningful with --volume)

format.description: the output format, defaults to table (choices: json, shell, table, value, yaml)

min_disk.description: Minimum disk size needed to boot image, in gigabytes

min_ram.description: Minimum RAM size needed to boot image, in megabytes

noindent.description: whether to disable indenting the JSON

private.description: Image is inaccessible to the public (default)

project.description: Set an alternate project on this image (name or ID)

project_domain.description: Domain the project belongs to (name or ID). This can be used in case collisions between project names exist.

project_id.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by id

project_name.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by name

property.description: Set a property on this image (repeat option to set multiple properties)

public.description: Image is accessible to the public

tag.description: Set a tag on this image (repeat option to set multiple tags)
